verses.verse: אֶפְרַ֜יִם <WH669> Ephraim רֹעֶ֥ה <WH7462> feedeth ר֙וּחַ֙ <WH7307> on wind וְרֹדֵ֣ף <WH7291> and followeth קָדִ֔ים <WH6921> after the east wind כָּל־ <WH3605> he הַיּ֕וֹם <WH3117> he daily כָּזָ֥ב <WH3577> lies וָשֹׁ֖ד <WH7701> and desolation יַרְבֶּ֑ה <WH7235> increaseth וּבְרִית֙ <WH1285> a covenant עִם־ <WH5973> with אַשּׁ֣וּר <WH804> with the Assyrians יִכְרֹ֔תוּ <WH3772> and they do make וְשֶׁ֖מֶן <WH8081> and oil לְמִצְרַ֥יִם <WH4714> into Egypt יוּבָֽל׃ <WH2986> is carried

וְרִ֥יב <WH7379> hath also a controversy לַֽיהוָ֖ה <WH3069> God עִם־ <WH5973> with יְהוּדָ֑ה <WH3063> with Judah וְלִפְקֹ֤ד <WH6485> and will punish עַֽל־ <WH5921> and יַעֲקֹב֙ <WH3290> Jacob כִּדְרָכָ֔יו <WH1870> according to his ways כְּמַעֲלָלָ֖יו <WH4611> according to his doings יָשִׁ֥יב <WH7725> will he recompense לֽוֹ׃

בַּבֶּ֖טֶן <WH990> in the womb עָקַ֣ב <WH6117> by the heel אֶת־ <WH853> אָחִ֑יו <WH251> He took his brother וּבְאוֹנ֖וֹ <WH202> and by his strength שָׂרָ֥ה <WH8280> he had power אֶת־ <WH854> with אֱלֹהִֽים׃ <WH430> with God

וָיָּ֤שַׂר <WH7786> Yea he had power אֶל־ <WH413> with מַלְאָךְ֙ <WH4397> over the angel וַיֻּכָ֔ל <WH3201> and prevailed בָּכָ֖ה <WH1058> he wept וַיִּתְחַנֶּן־ <WH2603> and made supplication ל֑וֹ בֵּֽית־ אֵל֙ <WH1008> him [in] Bethel יִמְצָאֶ֔נּוּ <WH4672> unto him he found וְשָׁ֖ם <WH8033> and there יְדַבֵּ֥ר <WH1696> and there he spake עִמָּֽנוּ׃ <WH5973> Even
וַֽיהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Even the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> God הַצְּבָא֑וֹת <WH6635> of hosts יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> the LORD זִכְרֽוֹ׃ <WH2143> [is] his memorial

וְאַתָּ֖ה <WH859> you בֵּאלֹהֶ֣יךָ <WH430> thou to thy God תָשׁ֑וּב <WH7725> Therefore turn חֶ֤סֶד <WH2617> mercy וּמִשְׁפָּט֙ <WH4941> and judgment שְׁמֹ֔ר <WH8104> keep וְקַוֵּ֥ה <WH6960> and wait אֶל־ <WH413> for אֱלֹהֶ֖יךָ <WH430> on thy God תָּמִֽיד׃ <WH8548> continually
כְּנַ֗עַן <WH3667> [He is] a merchant בְּיָד֛וֹ <WH3027> [are] in his hand מֹאזְנֵ֥י <WH3976> the balances מִרְמָ֖ה <WH4820> of deceit לַעֲשֹׁ֥ק <WH6231> to oppress אָהֵֽב׃ <WH157> he loveth

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> said אֶפְרַ֔יִם <WH669> And Ephraim אַ֣ךְ <WH389> Surely עָשַׁ֔רְתִּי <WH6238> Yet I am become rich מָצָ֥אתִי <WH4672> I have found me out א֖וֹן <WH202> substance לִ֑י כָּל־ <WH3605> all יְגִיעַ֕י <WH3018> [in] all my labours לֹ֥א <WH3808> No יִמְצְאוּ־ <WH4672> they shall find לִ֖י עָוֹ֥ן <WH5771> none iniquity אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which חֵֽטְא׃ <WH2399> in me that [were] sin

וְאָנֹכִ֛י <WH595> I יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> And I [that am] the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֖יךָ <WH430> thy God מֵאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> from the land מִצְרָ֑יִם <WH4714> of Egypt עֹ֛ד <WH5750> again אוֹשִֽׁיבְךָ֥ <WH3427> will yet make thee to dwell בָאֳהָלִ֖ים <WH168> in tabernacles כִּימֵ֥י <WH3117> as in the days מוֹעֵֽד׃ <WH4150> of the solemn feast

וְדִבַּ֙רְתִּי֙ <WH1696> I have also spoken עַל־ <WH5921> unto הַנְּבִיאִ֔ים <WH5030> by the prophets וְאָנֹכִ֖י <WH595> I חָז֣וֹן <WH2377> visions הִרְבֵּ֑יתִי <WH7235> and I have multiplied וּבְיַ֥ד <WH3027> by the ministry הַנְּבִיאִ֖ים <WH5030> of the prophets אֲדַמֶּֽה׃ <WH1819> and used similitudes

אִם־ <WH518> lo גִּלְעָ֥ד <WH1568> Gilead אָ֙וֶן֙ <WH205> [Is there] iniquity אַךְ־ <WH389> also שָׁ֣וְא <WH7723> are worthless הָי֔וּ <WH1961> become בַּגִּלְגָּ֖ל <WH1537> in Gilgal שְׁוָרִ֣ים <WH7794> bullocks זִבֵּ֑חוּ <WH2076> they sacrifice גַּ֤ם <WH1571> Yes מִזְבְּחוֹתָם֙ <WH4196> yea their altars כְּגַלִּ֔ים <WH1530> [are] as heaps עַ֖ל <WH5921> Beside תַּלְמֵ֥י <WH8525> in the furrows שָׂדָֽי׃ <WH7704> of the fields

וַיִּבְרַ֥ח <WH1272> fled יַעֲקֹ֖ב <WH3290> And Jacob שְׂדֵ֣ה <WH7704> into the country אֲרָ֑ם <WH758> of Syria וַיַּעֲבֹ֤ד <WH5647> served יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> and Israel בְּאִשָּׁ֔ה <WH802> for a wife וּבְאִשָּׁ֖ה <WH802> and for a wife שָׁמָֽר׃ <WH8104> he kept

וּבְנָבִ֕יא <WH5030> And by a prophet הֶעֱלָ֧ה <WH5927> brought יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> the LORD אֶת־ <WH853> יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> Israel מִמִּצְרָ֑יִם <WH4714> out of Egypt וּבְנָבִ֖יא <WH5030> and by a prophet נִשְׁמָֽר׃ <WH8104> was he preserved

הִכְעִ֥יס <WH3707> provoked [him] to anger אֶפְרַ֖יִם <WH669> Ephraim תַּמְרוּרִ֑ים <WH8563> most bitterly וְדָמָיו֙ <WH1818> his blood עָלָ֣יו <WH5921> and יִטּ֔וֹשׁ <WH5203> therefore shall he leave וְחֶ֨רְפָּת֔וֹ <WH2781> upon him and his reproach יָשִׁ֥יב <WH7725> return ל֖וֹ אֲדֹנָֽיו׃ <WH136> his Lord
